main event: An object was observed hovering over water at about 1,000 feet for approximately 2 minutes before climbing out of sight at a high rate of speed.
interesting points: The object was described as a round object maneuvering, The sighting lasted for 2 minutes, The object was tracked on Air-Visual radar and disappeared from it, A separate incoming telegram reported a luminous object almost as bright as the sun, The telegram mentioned guests being attracted by the object hovering overhead.
witness description: Guests attracted by the luminous object
